subject: USA UK MEGA MILLIONS AND BBC
body:
USA UK MEGA MILLIONS AND BBC NATIONAL LOTTERY 
UK Office 2 Lansdowne Row. 
Berkeley Square. London,  
United Kingdom  
Dear Email Owner,
Be glad this day as the result of the USA UK MEGA MILLIONS AND BBC NATIONAL LOTTERY 2013 Promotion Award has been released.
 
Your active e-mail address attached to computer generated ticket number: B556075456152 with reference Number 
 2008234522 has won you the tottery in the 1st category. This is from a total cash prize of $8,250,000.00 Shared amongst the 1691 with (4) lucky winner in "1st" category.
This to inform you that you have won prize money of USD$1, 350,000.00 (One Million three hundred and fifty thousand United States Dollars) for 2022 prize promotions which is organized by MEGA MILLIONS and BBC this 2023. MICRO SOFT collects all the email addresses of the people that are active online. among the millions that subscribed to Yahoo, Gmail, Hotmail and few from other e-mail providers 1691 people at selected every two years to benefit from this promotion and you are one of the Selected Winners. 
PAYMENT OF PRIZE AND CLAIM
USA UK MEGA MILLIONS AND BBC NATIONAL Prize Award must be claimed no later than 20th days, from date of Draw Notification. Any prize not claimed within this period will be forfeited.
 
Slated below are your Identification numbers: TICKET NUMBER:  B556075456152, REFERENCE NUMBER: 2008234522, WINNING NUMBER: 13 15 35 62 74 12.
 
These numbers fall within the AMERICA location file, you are requested to contact our fiduciary fiduciary agent in UNITED STATES OF AMERICA and send your winning identification numbers to him for payment:
 
CONTACT YOUR CLAIMS AGENT 
NAME: Allen brown 
E-Mall: 
allenbrown@workmail.com
 // 
allen4brown@zohomail.com
 
TEL: +1 339 800 8577 
You are advised to send the following Information to your Claim Agent to facIlitate the release your fund to you. 
1. Full name. 2. Contact Address. 3 Telephone Number. 4. Occupation/Age
5. Reference Number 6. Ticket Number 7. Winning Number.     
Congratulations?? Once again.
Yours in service
Angela M. Johnson
Publicity Secretary

subject: Re:  USA UK MEGA MILLIONS AND BBC
body:
Hello Angela M. Johnson,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I've won the lottery. This is a dream come true for me. I'm so grateful to USA UK MEGA MILLIONS AND BBC NATIONAL LOTTERY for this opportunity.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. How was my email address selected in the first place? And could you please explain more about how this promotion works? 

Also, could you provide more details about the process of claiming the prize? What happens after I contact the fiduciary agent?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Geneva

subject: Re:  the following information ASAP:
body:
USA UK MEGA MILLIONS AND BBC NATIONAL LOTTERY 
UK Office 2 Lansdowne Row, Berkeley Square, London, United Kingdom 
(Customer service) 
 
HI, 
 
Recall the lottery prize money you won was as a result of an international promotion and bonanza program for people that never played the lottery. Your email address was chosen after a random balloting technique with the computer. 
 
 
To claim your winning, kindly provide us with the following information ASAP:

Upon the receival of the above mentioned information, our paying bank shall contact you for your payment. Thanks and looking forward to being of continued service to you. 
 
Yours Sincerely, 
Allen Brown
